game.name: VMX
game.genres: 액션, 인디, 레이싱, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: VMX offers an authentic riding experience with gesture-based tricks and responsive bike handling. Take on challenges in carefully crafted skateparks and dirt tracks, customize your bike with a realistic spray-painting system, and express your style through a variety of outfits.
game.shortDescriptionEn: VMX offers an authentic riding experience with gesture-based tricks and responsive bike handling. Take on challenges in carefully crafted skateparks and dirt tracks, customize your bike with a realistic spray-painting system, and express your style through a variety of outfits.
